price: Mũ ne Mafi sani game da abin da suke saurãre da shi a lõkacin da suke yin saurãren zuwa gare ka, kuma a lõkacin da suke mãsu gãnãwa a tsakãninsu a lõkacin da azzãlumai suke cẽwa, "Bã ku biyar kõwa fãce wani namiji sihirtacce."
arabic: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَسۡتَمِعُونَ بِهِۦٓ إِذۡ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِذۡ هُمۡ نَجۡوَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَقُولُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلٗا مَّسۡحُورًا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu aʿlamu bimā yastamiʿūna bihi idh yastamiʿūna ilayka wa-idh hum najwā idh yaqūlu al-ẓālimūna in tattabiʿūna illā rajulan masḥūran
